content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal Mining and Smelting Facility at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position=Position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)) for smelting coal into other products
- Burner Mining Drill (position=Position(x=43.0, y=-82.0)) for mining coal
- Burner Inserter (position=Position(x=43.5, y=-80.5)) for transporting items between entities
- Chest (position=Position(x=42.5, y=-83.5)) for storing mined coal
- Chest (position=Position(x=44.5, y=-81.5)) for storing smelted products
- Chest (position=Position(x=45.5, y=-80.5)) for storing additional items
- Chest (position=Position(x=43.5, y=-79.5)) for storing additional coal

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items from chest
- Ensure the chest is not full before attempting to extract items
### Errors when mining with Burner Mining Drill
- Ensure the drill has sufficient fuel to continue mining
### Errors when using Burner Inserter
- Ensure the inserter has source items to pick up and a valid drop position
### Errors when smelting with Furnace
- Ensure the furnace has sufficient ingredients to smelt into products
